TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit BookmarkResumptionQuery extends System.Activities.Tracking.TrackingQuery

Docs.summary: When added to the <xref:System.Activities.Tracking.TrackingProfile.Queries%2A> collection, subscribes to bookmark resumption records when the tracking profile is queried for <xref:System.Activities.Tracking.TrackingRecord> objects.
